post.summary: Create a token (only reset password supported ATM - delivered by email with link to ~/user/resetpassword)

patch.summary: Patches user by token (update password and/or name).

put.summary: Update user details (Firstname, Lastname, Email, Profile photo (optional)

post.summary: Undo impersonation and return to previous session

get.summary: For apple to test the live app against a testing endpoint. So the app can be tested live before the api is pushed to production.
